thread.title: BRIEF-Qualcomm Director Paul Jacobs Will Not Be Re-Nominated To Qualcomm Board

title: BRIEF-Qualcomm Director Paul Jacobs Will Not Be Re-Nominated To Qualcomm Board
text: March 16, 2018 / 9:56 PM / in 13 minutes BRIEF-Qualcomm Director Paul Jacobs Will Not Be Re-Nominated To Qualcomm Board Reuters Staff March 16 (Reuters) - Qualcomm Inc: * QUALCOMM DIRECTOR PAUL JACOBS WILL NOT BE RE-NOMINATED TO QUALCOMM BOARD * QUALCOMM - PAUL JACOBS WILL NOT BE RE-NOMINATED TO QUALCOMM BOARD OF DIRECTORS AT QUALCOMM’S ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS ON MARCH 23, 2018 * QUALCOMM INC - ‍BOARD WILL CONSIST OF 10 DIRECTORS EFFECTIVE AS OF HOLDING OF ANNUAL MEETING​ * QUALCOMM - FOLLOWING WITHDRAWAL OF BROADCOM’S TAKEOVER PROPOSAL, CO IS “FOCUSED ON EXECUTING ITS BUSINESS PLAN” * QUALCOMM - DECIDED JACOBS WILL NOT BE RE-NOMINATED TO BOARD FOLLOWING HIS NOTIFICATION THAT HE WAS EXPLORING POSSIBILITY OF MAKING PROPOSAL TO BUY CO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
